媭字的基本解释

媭
（嬃）
xū
古女子人名用字。
古代楚人称姐姐为媭。

媭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》相俞切，平虞，心。］
“媭1”的繁体字。
古时女子人名用字。《楚辞·离骚》：“女嬃之嬋媛兮，申申其詈予。”王逸注：“女嬃，屈原姊也。”《史记·吕太后本纪》：“太后女弟吕嬃有女爲營陵侯劉澤妻。”司马贞索隐引韦昭曰：“吕嬃，樊噲妻，封林光侯。”一说，古时楚人谓姊为嬃。

媭字的康熙字典解释

Maid
Basic explanation of words
Maid
(sister)
xū
Ancient women's names used characters.
The ancient Chu people called their sister the maid.
Maid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guangyun" Xiangyu cut, Pingyu, heart. ]
Traditional characters for "媭1".
In ancient times, women's names were written in words. "Songs of the Chu: Lisao": "The daughter of a lady is a lady, and she is a lady of her own." Wang Yi's note: "The lady of a lady, and sister Qu Yuan is also." The female is the wife of Yingling Marquis Liu Ze." Sima Zhensuo faintly quoted Wei Zhao and said: "Lu Yan, Fan Kuai's wife, sealed Lin Guanghou." In ancient times, Chu people called her sister Yan.
